name: Breachers
abstract: Breachers is a tactical 5v5 VR FPS. Plan your assault or orchestrate your defense as a team through intense close-quarters combat. Climb, vault, rappel, swing, shoot & strategize your way to victory!

detail.app_languages: English, German, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Dutch, Italian, Portuguese, Polish, Spanish
detail.app_release_note:
#Competitive Hotfix v19.6.1
##Competitive
Fixed minimum level to play competitive (level 10) not working
Fixed the Global champion number showing -1 in scoreboard
Increased amount of Global Champions from 20 to 50
##General
Removed the line of sight while leaning behind the bathtub in Hideout's bathroom
Fixed teammate loadout in Buy Menu showing load of wrong teammate
Fixed spectator UI showing the wrong names
Fixed spectator last shooter action not working correctly
Fixed audio issue while in ghost after dying in a static field
Fixed friends appearing offline and online every few minutes
Fixed game getting stuck on logging in screen
Fixed rename popup not working
Fixed floating bullet decals
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
